Bash(git -C /Users/skrug/PycharmProjects/django-ninja-ts/.worktrees/openapi-ts-client-migration commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(generator\): use openapi-ts-client instead of subprocess

Replace subprocess-based openapi-generator-cli with direct Python calls
to openapi-ts-client library. This eliminates external Node.js and Java
dependencies, making the package pure Python.

Changes:
- Import generate_typescript_client and ClientFormat from openapi-ts-client
- Add FORMAT_MAP to convert string settings to ClientFormat enum
- Simplify _run_generator to call generate_typescript_client directly
- Remove subprocess, platform, and tempfile imports
- Remove GENERATOR_TIMEOUT constant
- Update tests to mock generate_typescript_client
- Remove obsolete subprocess-related tests \(stderr, temp cleanup, timeout\)
- Add test for axios format generation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
